tasks.title: Setup Project Repository and Modular Architecture
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository with Next.js (App Router), modular folder structure, and component library foundation.
tasks.details: Use Next.js v14+ with App Router for optimal code splitting. Set up /src/components (atoms, molecules, organisms, templates), /hooks, /services, /utils, /types, /constants. Initialize TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and Husky for code quality. Use Vercel for hosting. Implement Atomic Design principles for component structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify folder structure, linting, and TypeScript setup. Test basic Next.js routing and component rendering.

subtasks.title: Configure Next.js with App Router
subtasks.description: Set up Next.js to use the App Router for routing and ensure the app directory is present.
subtasks.details: During project setup, select 'Yes' for App Router to generate the /app directory and enable the latest routing conventions.

subtasks.title: Set Up TypeScript Support
subtasks.description: Configure TypeScript in the Next.js project for type safety and scalability.
subtasks.details: Install TypeScript and required type definitions, then allow Next.js to generate tsconfig.json and convert starter files to .tsx/.ts as needed.

subtasks.title: Establish Modular Folder Structure
subtasks.description: Create a modular folder structure including components, hooks, services, utils, types, and constants directories.
subtasks.details: Organize the src directory (or root) with clearly separated folders for each module to promote maintainability and scalability.

subtasks.title: Implement Atomic Design Principles in Component Library
subtasks.description: Structure the components directory according to Atomic Design (atoms, molecules, organisms, templates, pages).
subtasks.details: Within the components folder, create subfolders for each Atomic Design level and provide example components for each.

subtasks.title: Set Up ESLint and Prettier for Code Quality
subtasks.description: Install and configure ESLint and Prettier for linting and code formatting.
subtasks.details: Add ESLint and Prettier dependencies, create configuration files, and ensure they work with TypeScript and Next.js.

subtasks.title: Configure Husky for Git Hooks
subtasks.description: Set up Husky to enforce code quality checks (linting, formatting) before commits and pushes.
subtasks.details: Install Husky, add pre-commit and pre-push hooks to run ESLint and Prettier, and verify integration with the repository.

subtasks.title: Configure Vercel Deployment
subtasks.description: Set up deployment to Vercel for continuous integration and delivery.
subtasks.details: Connect the repository to Vercel, configure project settings, and verify successful deployment of the modular Next.js app.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication with Supabase Auth
tasks.description: Integrate secure user authentication for chiropractors and parents using Supabase Auth.
tasks.details: Use Supabase Auth (v2+) for authentication. Set up email/password and OAuth providers. Implement session management, secure cookies, and session timeout. Ensure input validation and sanitization. Store user roles (chiropractor, parent).
tasks.testStrategy: Test user registration, login, logout, and session management. Verify role-based access and session timeout.

tasks.title: Design and Implement Database Schema
tasks.description: Define and implement the core database schema using Supabase (PostgreSQL).
tasks.details: Create tables for Practices, Assessments, Reports, Email Campaigns, and Users. Define relationships and constraints. Use Supabase v2+ with PostgreSQL 15+. Implement modular data access layer.
tasks.testStrategy: Test CRUD operations for each entity. Validate relationships and constraints.

tasks.title: Develop Core Survey Form Components
tasks.description: Build reusable, modular survey form components for the 3-step assessment process.
tasks.details: Create React components for each survey step (Lifestyle Stressors, Symptoms, Contact/Consent). Use Formik v2+ and Yup for validation. Ensure mobile-first, accessible design. Implement progress indicators.
tasks.testStrategy: Test form validation, navigation between steps, and accessibility. Verify mobile responsiveness.

tasks.title: Implement Dynamic Report Generation
tasks.description: Develop a system to generate personalized PDF reports from survey responses.
tasks.details: Use React-PDF (v2+) or PDFKit for dynamic PDF generation. Map survey responses to visual charts and diagrams. Integrate practice branding. Support offline and online report generation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test report generation with various survey inputs. Verify branding and visual elements.

tasks.title: Build Chiropractor Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop the chiropractor dashboard for practice management and customization.
tasks.details: Create dashboard layout with reusable components. Implement practice branding, contact management, and video upload. Use Next.js App Router for routing. Support customization of email templates and assessment questions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard navigation, customization features, and data display.

tasks.title: Integrate Email Service (Resend)
tasks.description: Integrate Resend for automated email delivery and campaign management.
tasks.details: Use Resend API (latest) for sending emails. Implement email templates, scheduling, and tracking. Support bi-weekly educational sequences and custom content.
tasks.testStrategy: Test email delivery, scheduling, and template rendering.

tasks.title: Develop Analytics and Reporting Module
tasks.description: Build analytics dashboard for survey completion, sharing, and lead conversion tracking.
tasks.details: Use Chart.js (v4+) or similar for data visualization. Track survey completion, report sharing, and viral coefficient. Implement lead generation and conversion metrics.
tasks.testStrategy: Test data visualization, metric calculation, and dashboard updates.

tasks.title: Implement Social Media Sharing and Viral Tracking
tasks.description: Add social media sharing and viral marketing tracking features.
tasks.details: Integrate social sharing APIs (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn). Track sharing events and viral coefficient. Use practice-specific landing pages for sharing links.
tasks.testStrategy: Test sharing functionality and tracking of sharing events.

tasks.title: Build Content Library and Template Engine
tasks.description: Develop a content library and template engine for educational content and campaigns.
tasks.details: Create a content management system for text, images, and videos. Support customizable templates and multi-format content. Use React components for content rendering.
tasks.testStrategy: Test content upload, template customization, and rendering.

tasks.title: Optimize for Performance and Bundle Size
tasks.description: Optimize application for fast load times and minimal bundle size.
tasks.details: Implement code splitting, tree-shaking, and dynamic imports. Enforce file size limits (React components <200 lines, utility functions <100 lines, etc.). Use Lighthouse CI and bundle analyzer. Target initial load <50KB, route chunks <25KB, total app <200KB gzipped.
tasks.testStrategy: Run Lighthouse audits, bundle analysis, and performance tests.

tasks.title: Implement Security and Compliance Features
tasks.description: Add security and compliance features including HTTPS, data encryption, and HIPAA-ready architecture.
tasks.details: Enforce HTTPS, data encryption at rest, secure authentication, input validation, session timeout, audit trails, and consent management. Prepare for future HIPAA compliance.
tasks.testStrategy: Test security headers, encryption, session management, and audit trails.

tasks.title: Develop Tablet and Offline Survey Experience
tasks.description: Build tablet-optimized, offline-capable survey experience for waiting rooms.
tasks.details: Use Progressive Web App (PWA) capabilities for offline support. Optimize UI for tablets. Integrate with existing patient check-in processes. Store survey responses locally and sync when online.
tasks.testStrategy: Test offline survey completion, data sync, and tablet responsiveness.

tasks.title: Integrate Payment Processing (Stripe)
tasks.description: Add Stripe integration for payment processing and subscription management.
tasks.details: Use Stripe API (latest) for payments and subscriptions. Support practice billing and premium features. Implement secure checkout and subscription management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test payment processing, subscription management, and security.

tasks.title: Prepare for Mobile App Conversion and Scale Testing
tasks.description: Prepare the platform for future mobile app conversion and scale testing.
tasks.details: Optimize PWA for mobile app conversion. Implement API foundations for modular endpoints. Conduct scale testing with 1000+ concurrent users. Monitor performance and stability.
tasks.testStrategy: Test PWA installation, API scalability, and performance under load.
